title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details' duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: a. The buttons are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: a. The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. b. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. c. Multiple selection should be allowed as move up/down can be applied to more than one item. d. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. Also, it would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR: 1. Open the application. 2. Go to the 'Modify Parameters' section. 3. Verify that the buttons are too small. 4. Verify that when the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected but both move buttons are enabled. 5. Change a parameter name to something very long and verify that the preview is cut off. 6. Verify that the dialog appears huge for methods with many parameters. 7. Verify that the marking between the button and list is too large. 8. Verify that the top button is not aligned with the dialog top. 9. Verify that the table does not have a label. 10. Verify that multiple selection is not allowed. 11. Verify that the signature preview is not a label that wraps. 12. Verify that the signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
